column6: My place is close to everything in Houston! 5 minutes from Galleria. 10 minutes from NRG Stadium. 10-15 minutes from Downtown all by car. Many great restaurants nearby. Located in a safe and quite neighborhood.\nYouâ€™ll love my place because the private room has lots of natural light and a private bathroom. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.
